name: The Story of Roanoake
description:
A submission to the People's Jam 2021 Controls: Press Enter to enter Documents or Interact Move and Switch documents with Left and Right Arrow Keys Solve a Mystery, Hundreds of Years in the Making

A new game by Team Azule with music by Maxwell Dexter for The People's Jam, The Story of Roanoke tells the fictional story of the mysterious disappearance of Roanoke Colony. When a trove of documents is discovered in the modern day you must, as a historian, decipher a mysterious letter and uncover the secret at the heart of Roanoke's past.

Troubleshooting: If the browser version is lagging in the browser, please download the game for either Windows or Mac below!

The Story of Roanoke
